ai-atk-s0517a14:11_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you seventy-seven grounds for knowledge. You should listen and pay attention, I will speak.
ai-atk-s0517a14:11_1: What are the seventy-seven grounds for knowledge?
ai-atk-s0517a14:11_2: The knowledge that rebirth is a condition for old age and death, and the knowledge that when rebirth doesn’t exist, there is no old age and death.
ai-atk-s0517a14:11_3: Also regarding the past: the knowledge that rebirth is a condition for old age and death, and the knowledge that when rebirth doesn’t exist, there is no old age and death.
ai-atk-s0517a14:11_4: And also their knowledge that even this knowledge of the stability of natural principles is liable to end, vanish, fade away, and cease.
ai-atk-s0517a14:11_5: The knowledge that continued existence is a condition for rebirth ...
ai-atk-s0517a14:11_6: Grasping is a condition for continued existence. ...
ai-atk-s0517a14:11_7: The knowledge that craving is a condition for grasping ...
ai-atk-s0517a14:11_8: The knowledge that feeling is a condition for craving.
ai-atk-s0517a14:11_9: The knowledge that contact is a condition for feeling ...
ai-atk-s0517a14:11_10: The six sense fields are conditions for contact. ...
ai-atk-s0517a14:11_11: The six sense fields are conditions for the six sense fields. ...
ai-atk-s0517a14:11_12: Knowledge is a condition for name and form. ...
ai-atk-s0517a14:11_13: The knowledge that choices are a condition for consciousness ...
ai-atk-s0517a14:11_14: The knowledge that ignorance is a condition for choices, and the knowledge that when ignorance doesn’t exist, there are no choices.
ai-atk-s0517a14:11_15: Also regarding the past: the knowledge that ignorance is a condition for choices, and the knowledge that when ignorance doesn’t exist, there are no choices.
ai-atk-s0517a14:11_16: And also their knowledge that even this knowledge of the stability of natural principles is liable to end, vanish, fade away, and cease.
ai-atk-s0517a14:11_17: These are called the seventy-seven grounds for knowledge.”
